column1:
Overall, the sentiment percentages of Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, and General have fluctuated over the years. In 2016, Cleaniness and Amenities both had a sentiment percentage of 0%. From 2017 to 2020, the sentiment percentages of all aspects gradually increased. In 2021, the sentiment percentages of Amenities and Location had a slight decrease while Cleaniness, Service, and General still maintained an increasing trend. By 2022, the sentiment percentage for all aspects had a slight decrease resulting in the sentiment percentage General being the lowest in this year (54.085430). In 2023, the sentiment percentages had increased again. On average, the sentiment percentage of General was the highest at 58.028899 and the lowest at Amenities at 65.866357.

To improve the overall sentiment percentages in each aspect, there are several things that can be done. Firstly, it is important to ensure that all aspects and areas related to a visitor's experience is clean and tidy. This can be done by regularly cleaning and maintaining all areas and ensuring that all amenities are working properly. Secondly, it is important to provide more amenities that cater to visitors needs, from basic amenities to specific amenities. Finally, it is important to ensure that the location of the establishment is easily accessible and well maintained by providing facilities and services that are adequate and helpful to visitors. Additionally, it is important to ensure that all services provided are specialized and customer-focused to ensure guest satisfaction.
